Headline: Delays Affecting Howard-bound Red Line Trains
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are running with delays from congestion due to signal problems at Howard. Crews working to restore normal service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running with delays from congestion due to signal problems at Howard.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Crews are working to clear the congestion that's formed and restore normal travel times through the area.

Allow extra travel time.
